description: Led the development of responsive web applications using Vue.js and TypeScript. Implemented accessibility best practices and improved performance by 40%.
Developed custom websites and web applications for clients across various industries. Collaborated with designers to implement pixel-perfect UI components.
Built and maintained marketing websites and landing pages. Gained experience in modern web development practices and responsive design.
Assisted in creating website mockups and learned fundamentals of web development. Gained hands-on experience with HTML, CSS, and basic JavaScript.
Studied computer science fundamentals including algorithms, data structures, and software engineering. Completed multiple programming projects and participated in hackathons.
Provided technical support and computer repair services. Developed problem-solving skills and customer service experience while learning about hardware and software troubleshooting.
Completed high school education with focus on mathematics and science. First exposure to programming through computer science electives.
